audio_by_time.map: function(doc) { if (doc.recording || doc.mark) { var type = 'recording'; if (doc.mark) type = 'mark'; var result = { _id: doc._id, type: type, start : doc[type].start }; if (doc.recording) { result.file = doc._attachments; } if (doc[type].length) { result.end = (doc[type].length * 1000) + doc[type].start; } if (doc.tags && doc.tags.length > 0) { result.tags = doc.tags; } if (doc.text && doc.text != null) { result.text = doc.text; } emit(result.start, result); } }
